OBJECTIVE:

to develop my skills and knowledge in the field of Mechanical Engineering (Oil & Gas Sector).

SKILLS:  
 
 Good knowledge of Off -shore & on -shore painting / coating inspection (Oil & gas / petrochemical, 
industrial, marine)  
 Welding Defect Interpretation & Rectification  
 Experience and knowledge of maintaining and operating management systems to the guiding 
standards (ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISM and OHSAS 18001), Auditing & Documentation.  
 Strong Believer in team work & Leading a team  
 
 
CV: QA/QC Engineer                                                                                                             Page 2 of 3  
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:  
 
 Company              : Gulf Turrets LLC,UAE  
      Period                    : August 2014 to Oct 2016  
Position                 : QA/QC Engineer -Structural  
Clients  Handled    : ADCO, ENOC,ADNOC,AL JABAR,TECTNIP,KENTZ ,Etc…  
Responsibi lities: 
 
 Reviewing all related documents like WPS, PQR, ITP and QAP  
 Follow  and Implementation of all QA/QC procedure and Quality Plans  
 Responsible for stage wise  welding,  painting / coating inspection.   
 Monitor weather condition for surface preparation and painting / coating application.  
 Execute Painting / coating inspection work as per company / project inspection test plan.  
 To check and monitor all painting / coating rel ated works and ensure all final products meet in 
accordance with company procedure, client requirement and international codes.  
 Review all the related documents and release the fabrication Spools for packing and Loading.  
 Inspection of incoming materials an d hard stamping to be checked and cross check with MTC.  
 Ensure Latest fabrication drawings are available at site and being used for fabrication.  
 Weld preparation ( Bevel  Preparation as per wps) with allowable tolerance to be ensured.  
 Dimensional requirement  in each stage as required and weld visual inspection  
 Document control, Control of various Inspection and measuring tools, preparation of as built.  
 Preparing of all QA/QC Documents and gets approval from client and TPI Inspector  
 Assisting ISO Audit  
 
 Company           : Coimbatore  Industrial Radiographer, India  
      Period                : August 2012 to July 2014  
Position              : QA/QC Junior Inspector -NDT  
Responsibilities : 
 Document control, Control of various Inspection and measuring tools, preparation of as built.  
 Review the Standard and doing the Radiography Film Interpretation and  Set up the equipment  
 Prepare test report for i. Accept ii. Reject iii. Rework  
 Be familiar with production processes of the test material and knowledge of type a nd location of 
expected defects  
 To develop RT,UT,MPT,DP  technique for testing a particular job  
 Prepare written instruction for Level I, Guide and check test results  of Level I operators  
 
 Company            : Taneja Aerospace &  Aviation Ltd , India.                                                                                                                          
Period                 : July 2011 to July 2012  
Position               : Graduate Trainee -NDT  
            Respon sibilities   : 
 Review of Material Test Certificates, as per codes, Standard Client Specifications.  
 Review and Maintaining of PT,MT ,RT,UT-Instrument Calibration Certificates, Personal NDT  
Certificates, Batch Test Certificates  for PT,MT, RT,UT consumables etc., 
 As per the client’s procedures NDT inspection is done .
